original_title: Pedro Capo: En Letra de Otro
overview: Award-winning Puerto Rican singer-songwriter Pedro Capo honors a variety of leading Latin artists he grew up with by performing a selection of their hits--songs we know and love--in his own style. This special features covers of Selena, Chayanne, Jon Secada, Jerry Rivera, Luis Miguel, Calle 13, OV7, Fey, and Donato y Estefano plus commentary from Pedro himself.
tagline: Award-winning Puerto Rican musician Pedro Capo covers songs by Selena, Luis Miguel, Calle 13 and more in this special.
title: Pedro Capo: En Letra de Otro
